name: Open Source projects by Michael MÃ¼ller
body:
|Name|Description|Screenshot|
|:---:|:---:|:---:|
|[Billy](https://github.com/haimich/billy)|A simple invoice manager built with Electron.|![billy](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/haimich/billy/master/concept/accountants.png)|
|Event|A platform to manage events and conferences built on NodeJS|![event](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/haimich/event/master/documentation/screenshot_1.png)|
|Flatfinder|A web scraper tool that regularly scans websites where flats are offered to buy.|![flatfinder](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/haimich/flatfinder/master/logo.png)|
|Knick-Knack|A language agnostic project scaffolding tool.|![knick-knack](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/knick-knack/knick-knack/master/keepcalm.png)|
|Photobooth|A JavaScript photobooth application where you can pick an own background image via green screen.|![photobooth](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/haimich/photobooth/master/concept/screenshot.png)|
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
